abstract: Although ABC did not dominate Monday night, the network attracted the most viewers, with roughly 20.3 million of them tuning in to an extended 96-minute version of “Dancing With the Stars” at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. After that, however, viewership dropped, with ABC’s latest installment of “The Bachelor” drawing less than 9 million viewers from 9:36 to 11 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Although ABC did not dominate Monday night, the network attracted the most viewers, with roughly 20.3 million of them tuning in to an extended 96-minute version of “Dancing With the Stars” at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. After that, however, viewership dropped, with ABC’s latest installment of “The Bachelor” drawing less than 9 million viewers from 9:36 to 11 p.m.
